name: Repeated Animation Builder
description: Looping animation builder with interpolated values.

use: you need a simple repeating value animation between two numbers.
you want to avoid wiring a dedicated AnimationController for simple loops.
avoid: you need pausable, seekable, or timeline-based choreography.

accessibility: Avoid very short durations that can create aggressive flashing.
do: Use smooth curves for subtle looping effects.
dont: Do not animate critical reading text continuously.
